stories.title: Norway
stories.des1: DAY 1: Had an awesome first day exploring the Geirangerfjord. Took this glamour shot from the hillside next to our cabin
stories.des2: DAY 2: We went down to a nearby lake, this foggy morning. The original plan was to go fishing, but the lake didn't show much activity so we decided to just have lunch there.
stories.des3: DAY 3: The perfect ending to the weekend. We got to see an aurora for the first time ever

stories.title: Amazon
stories.des1: The journey through the Amazon river started on this beautiful Saturday morning
stories.des2: After about 3 hours of paddling we get a well deserved break in front of this magnificent rainbow
stories.des3: As the afternoon came, we decided to get out of our boats and do some exploring on land. There we encountered this little fellow.

stories.title: Mountain
stories.des2: View of the peak of the mountain

stories.title: Graveyard
stories.des1: Good start to the night with this surreal moonrise
stories.des2: This statue is staring right at us and it's creepy. However, we went to sleep next to it anyway.
